WorkItem.ClosedComment: Closing old Fixed defects.... Esp. since there's been quite a few builds since these were marked fixed.  Any new instances of those issues should be created in new defects.
WorkItem.Description: For the next version, the frost presence multipliers will need to be adjusted to come back in line with the recent DK nerf.  Instead of 80% bonus armor from frost presence, we now receive 60%.
WorkItem.Summary: [TankDK] Frost Presence / Imp Frost Presence Change

Comments.Message: Correction to my TITLE for this; Imp Frost Presence is not affected at all, as it does not concern the 80% bonus armor.  Therefore, only TankDKs should be affected by this nerf.  *Wish i could edit my title.*
Good way to estimate in the mean-time is to just get rid of toughness, but yes. Will need a fix.
Fixed in TankDK.  See changelist: 34404 (hell, Frost presence wasn't even factored in by the looks of things, so now it looks appropriate)
